# API Overview

## Introduction

<!-- Describe the purpose and scope of the {{repoName}} API. -->

**Base URL:** `https://api.example.com/v1`
**Current Version:** {{version}}

## Design Principles

1. **RESTful** — Resources are nouns; HTTP methods are verbs.
2. **Consistent** — All endpoints follow the same patterns for pagination,
   filtering, and error handling.
3. **Versioned** — Breaking changes are introduced in new API versions.

## Quick Start

```bash
# Authenticate
curl -X POST https://api.example.com/v1/auth/token \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"client_id": "YOUR_ID", "client_secret": "YOUR_SECRET"}'

# Fetch a resource
curl https://api.example.com/v1/resource \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN"
```
